attributes.action: Remove Charges Brought Against Alan Pollock
attributes.additional_details:
Police have charged Alan Pollock with assault after an alleged fare-dodger was removed from a train by a passenger.

Mobile phone recordings by a passenger on board the Edinburgh to Perth train on 9 December have been viewed by almost two million people on You Tube.

It shows a Alan Pollock - since dubbed 'Big Man' - throwing a teenager off a train after he verbally abused with an elderly ticket inspector.
